changeRepositionOverride.theText: Block access to the supply caches.

globalEvents.name: Open Crate 1
globalEvents.eventText:
You rummage through the supplies and take whatever seems useful.

Draw a supply card. You gain 1 medpac. Claim this token.

globalEvents.name: Mission Briefing
globalEvents.eventText:
You fight your way past the sentries to the center of the pirate camp, where you find the stolen medical supplies and several blaster pistols pointed in your direction. A grizzled pirate in a long coat sneers at Vinto, “Welcome home, friend.”

{-} Deploy the heroes to the blue highlighted space.

eventActions.theText: {-} Neutral mission tokens represent Rodian pirates. Rodian pirates are Imperial figures. Tokens of the same color form a group.

eventActions.bonuses:
OLD RIVALRY: If Vinto Hreeda can be attacked, he becomes the target of all attacks during this activation. In this case, add 1 green die to the first attack.
SHOT ON THE RUN: After the first Move instruction during this activation is carried out, 1 Rebel figure within 3 spaces and line of sight of the Rodian pirate suffers 1 {C}.
LONG-RANGE SHOT: The Rodian pirates gain +3 Accuracy.

enemyGroupData.customText:
{Q} Move 3 to attack {rebel}. Apply +1 {H} to the attack results.
{A} Move 1 to reposition 3.
{A} Move 5 to reposition 3.

LONG-RANGE SHOT: The Rodian pirates gain +3 Accuracy.

eventActions.theText: Vinto remains impassive, hand on his blaster. "This is no longer my home, and you are no longer my friend." The pirates move to protect the stolen supplies.

entityProperties.name: Cache 1
entityProperties.theText:
A supply cache with stolen medical supplies is stored here.

{-} A Rebel figure on or adjacent to a supply cache may spend 2 movement points to test {J} or {I} to try and claim the cache.

eventActions.theText:
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent supply caches.
{-} A Rebel figure on or adjacent to a supply cache may spend 2 movement points to test {J} or {I} to try and claim the cache.
{-} The mission will progress when all supply caches have been claimed.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

{-} Neutral mission tokens represent Rodian pirates. Rodian pirates are Imperial figures. Tokens of the same color form a group.
{-} Imperial mission tokens represent supply caches.
{-} A Rebel figure on or adjacent to a supply cache may spend 2 movement points to test {J} or {I} to try and claim the cache.
{-} The mission will progress when all supply caches have been claimed.
{-} The Rebels lose at the end of Round 6, or when all heroes are wounded.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels win
globalEvents.eventText:
The camp is strewn with carnage and ruin. Vinto stands over the body of the Rodian captain and whispers to himself, “Justice is served.” He loads the medical supplies onto his back and begins the journey back to his village.

{-} The Rebels win the mission!
{-} Vinto Hreeda receives the “Desperado” Reward card.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

globalEvents.name: End of Mission - Rebels lose
globalEvents.eventText:
You are overrun by the pirates and forced to retreat. The Rodian who greeted Vinto shouts after him, "Same old Vinto: too weak to succeed, too cowardly to die!"

{-} The Rebels lose the mission.
{-} Each hero receives 1 XP. Heroes receive 100 credits per hero.

eventActions.theText:
You try to open the locked cache.

{-} Test {J} or {I}. Apply +1 {B} for each strain token on the cache, then discard all strain tokens on the cache. Enter the number of successes below.

inputList.theText:
The cache is still locked tight.

{-} Place 1 strain token on the cache for each {B} result gained.

globalEvents.name: Cache Success 1
globalEvents.eventText: You manage to open the cache and take the medical supplies.

globalEvents.name: From the Forest
globalEvents.eventText: A snarling beast emerges from the forest of Rodia.

globalEvents.name: Tracking Beacon
globalEvents.eventText: As you gather the first stolen medical supplies, a tracking beacon nearby begins to beep rapidly, calling in reinforcements.

globalEvents.name: Still Tracking
globalEvents.eventText: More enemies follow the tracking beacon's signal.

globalEvents.name: We've Got Company
globalEvents.eventText: As you gather the last stolen supplies, you see that more pirates are rushing in, trying to stop you from escaping. You return the fire to cover your departure.
